Class PopulationStatistics

java.lang.Object
com.example.moviepopularitybackend.model.PopulationStatistics
public class PopulationStatistics extends Object
Represents the population data for a specific country and year.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PopulationStatistics()
    Constructs an empty Population object and initializes the age group categories map.

  • Constructor Details

    • PopulationStatistics

      public PopulationStatistics()
      Constructs an empty Population object and initializes the age group categories map.

  • Method Details

    • getCountry

      public String getCountry()
      Gets the country for which the population data applies.
      Returns:
      the country name.

    • setCountry

      public void setCountry(String country)
      Sets the country for which the population data applies.
      Parameters:
      country - the country name.

    • getYear

      public int getYear()
      Gets the year of the population data.
      Returns:
      the year as an integer.

    • setYear

      public void setYear(int year)
      Sets the year of the population data.
      Parameters:
      year - the year as an integer.

    • getIndicatorValue

      public int getIndicatorValue()
      Retrieves the value of the selected indicator. The indicator is chosen by the user and can represent one of the following: total population, life expectancy, population change, or total net migration.
      Returns:
      the selected indicator's value as an integer.

    • setIndicatorValue

      public void setIndicatorValue(int indicatorValue)
      Sets the value of the selected indicator. The indicator value is an integer representing one of the following metrics: total population, life expectancy, population change, or total net migration.
      Parameters:
      indicatorValue - the value to set for the selected indicator.

    • getPopulationAges

      public Map<String,AgeGroup> getPopulationAges()
      Gets the categorized population data by age groups.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the age group category (e.g., "0-14") and the value is the AgeGroup object.

    • setPopulationAges

      public void setPopulationAges(Map<String,AgeGroup> populationAgeGroups)
      Sets the categorized population data by age groups.
      Parameters:
      populationAgeGroups - a map where the key is the age group category and the value is the AgeGroup object representing population data.
